addDelegate(address).details: This function will be only be callable by the Channel Owner from the PushCore contract. NOTE:   Verification of whether or not a Channel Address is actually the owner of the Channel, will be done via the PUSH NODES.

params._delegate: address of the delegate who is allowed to Send Notifications

params._channelList: array of addresses of the channels that the user wishes to Subscribe
array of addresses of the channels that the user wishes to Unsubscribe

changeUserChannelSettings(address,uint25.details: Updates the userToChannelNotifs mapping to keep track of a User's Notification Settings for a Specific Channel          Deliminated Notification Settings string contains -> Decimal Representation Notif Settings +          Notification Settings          For instance, for a Notif Setting that looks like -> 3+1-0+2-0+3-1+4-98              3 -> Decimal Representation of the Notification Options selected by the User          For Boolean Type Notif Options          1-0 -> 1 stands for Option 1 - 0 Means the user didn't choose that Notif Option.          3-1 stands for Option 3      - 1 Means the User Selected the 3rd boolean Option         For SLIDER TYPE Notif Options          2-0 -> 2 stands for Option 2 - 0 is user's Choice          4-98-> 4 stands for Option 4 - 98is user's Choice

params._channel: - Address of the Channel for which the user is creating the Notif settings
params._notifID: - Decimal Representation of the Options selected by the user
params._notifSettings: - Deliminated string that depicts the User's Notifcation Settings

params._channel: address of the channel that the user is subscribing to

returns._0: True if User is actually a subscriber of a Channel

removeDelegate(address).details: This function will be only be callable by the Channel Owner from the PushCore contract. NOTE:   Verification of whether or not a Channel Address is actually the owner of the Channel, will be done via the PUSH NODES.

params._delegate: address of the delegate who is allowed to Send Notifications

sendNotifBySig(address,address,address,b.details: Allows the Caller to Simply Sign the transaction to initiate the Send Notif Function        Inludes EIP1271 implementation: Standard Signature Validation Method for Contracts

returns._0: bool returns whether or not send notification credentials was successful.

sendNotification(address,address,bytes).details: Emits out notification details once all the requirements are passed.

params._recipient: address of the reciever of the Notification

subscribe(address).details: Subscribes the caller of the function to a particular Channel         - Takes into Consideration the "msg.sender"

params._channel: address of the channel that the user is subscribing to

subscribeBySig(address,address,uint256,u.details: Takes into Consideration the Sign of the User Inludes EIP1271 implementation: Standard Signature Validation Method for Contracts

subscribeViaCore(address,address).details: Only Callable by the PushCore. This is to ensure that Users should only able to Subscribe for their own addresses.         The caller of the main Subscribe function should Either Be the USERS themselves(for their own addresses) or the PushCore contract

params._channel: address of the channel that the user is subscribing to
params._user: address of the Subscriber of a Channel

params._channel: address of the channel being unsubscribed
params._user: address of the UnSubscriber of a Channel

unsubscribe(address).details: UnSubscribes the caller of the function from the particular Channel.    Takes into Consideration the "msg.sender"

params._channel: address of the channel that the user is unsubscribing to

unsubscribeBySig(address,address,uint256.details: Takes into Consideration the Signer of the transactioner      Inludes EIP1271 implementation: Standard Signature Validation Method for Contracts

addDelegate(address).notice: Allows a Channel Owner to ADD a Delegate for sending Notifications         Delegate shall be able to send Notification on the Channel's Behalf

batchSubscribe(address[]).notice: Allows users to subscribe a List of Channels at once

batchUnsubscribe(address[]).notice: Allows users to unsubscribe from a List of Channels at once

changeUserChannelSettings(address,uint25.notice: Allows Users to Create and Subscribe to a Specific Notication Setting for a Channel.

isUserSubscribed(address,address).notice: Helper function to check if User is Subscribed to a Specific Address

removeDelegate(address).notice: Allows a Channel Owner to Remove a Delegate's Permission to Send Notification

sendNotifBySig(address,address,address,b.notice: Meta transaction function for Sending Notifications

sendNotification(address,address,bytes).notice: Allows a Channel Owners, Delegates as well as Users to send Notifications

subscribe(address).notice: External Subscribe Function that allows users to Diretly interact with the Base Subscribe function

subscribeViaCore(address,address).notice: Allows PushCore contract to call the Base Subscribe function whenever a User Creates his/her own Channel.         This ensures that the Channel Owner is subscribed to imperative Push Channels as well as his/her own Channel.

unSubscribeViaCore(address,address).notice: Allows PushCore contract to call the Base UnSubscribe function whenever a User Destroys his/her TimeBound Channel.         This ensures that the Channel Owner is unSubscribed from the imperative Push Channels as well as his/her own Channel.        NOTE-If they don't unsubscribe before destroying their Channel, they won't be able to create the Channel again using the same Wallet Address.

unsubscribe(address).notice: External Unsubcribe Function that allows users to directly unsubscribe from a particular channel

documentation.text: @notice emits whenever a new delegate is added
@notice emits whenever any delegate is removed
@notice emits whenever an address subscribes to any channel
@notice emits whenever an address unsubscribes from any channel
@notice emits whenever public key is broadcasted internally
@notice emits whenever a user opts for notification settings
@notice emits whenever alias is added for any channel
@notice emits whenever a user initiates an incentivized chat

@notice Allows users to subscribe a List of Channels at once
 @param _channelList array of addresses of the channels that the user wishes to Subscribe

@notice Allows users to unsubscribe from a List of Channels at once
 @param _channelList array of addresses of the channels that the user wishes to Unsubscribe
